reviewText: Classic pack! Love all these flicks and they display great in the box!!!

If you are a fan of campy cheesy films  then you will love these films
they come in their own regular dvd case in a cool little beer case box
I bought this as an xmas gift for my brother and he loved it!  It's a great package of cheezy horror films from the 1980's.

The pack includes:

Elvira - Mistress of the Dark
Return of the Killer Tomatoes
Transylvania 6-5000
Return to Horror High
Sleepaway Camp
Vamp

Great classics, with all the cheese you need!

No Extras other than theatrical trailers.
